text:
Fauja Singh BEM (, born 1 April 1911) is a British Sikh centenarian marathon runner. He has beaten a number of world records in multiple age brackets, but none of his times have been ratified as records.
His current personal best time for the London Marathon (2003) is 6 hours 2 minutes, and his marathon record, for age 90-plus, is 5 hours 40 minutes at the age of 92, at the 2003 Toronto Waterfront Marathon.
